info.description:
Zach at his school gets pushed around by everyone. When it's christmas eve, he wishes for possession powers that he can use to get revenge on people who pushed him around.

Zack Holmes- 15 year old teen. He wears a dark blue "Kiss" teeshirt, black camo pants and blue hiking boots. He is born on december 2, 1997. He lives with his mother and father. Has 1 girlfriend. Has two sisters.

Jenn Holmes- Older sister of Zack. She got her looks from her mother. Her and Zack get alone together. She loves to play one certain videogame with Zack and that "Black Ops." She goes to his school and is on the cheerleading squad. Jenn is always nice to Zack. Has B cup breast.

Jasmine Holmes- Zack doesn't know much about her and also Zack's mother.

Jack Holmes- Zack's father. Doesn't know much about him either.

Aelita Hopper- Zack's girlfriend. She loves the band, "Kiss" as much as Zack. Aelita has dated Zack since preschool. She stands up for Zack in any situation. She is 15 years old. She is the captain for the girls basketball team at Zack's school.

1. Don't kill Zach.

2. Zach can only possess one person at a time at the start of the story. Once more into the story, his possession power grows and then he could possess more than one person
